Job Title: Software Development Engineer II / III - Data Structure / Algorithm
Job Description: Requirement :- The ideal candidate should have a passion for building products, solving problems, and building a data pipeline.- 5+ years hands-on experience in Java, Clojure or Scala, data structures and algorithms on Linux- Knowledge of Spark, Flink.- The basics must be very strong - design, coding, testing, and debugging skills.- Experience with Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes experience a plus- A demonstrable understanding of software development concepts, problem break down, project management, and good communication.- Experience should be in product build life cycle of developing, debugging, optimizing and maintaining code. BE, BTECH in CS/EE/CE or related field from a top institution
